K10sf265_sc:wal2: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṁ pravrajaṁti sarve te caturṇāṁ āryasatyānāṁ jñānāya |
K10sf265_sc:wal4: duḥkham āryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya duḥkhanirodhasya duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyasya jñānāya |
K10sf265_sc:wal5: tasmāt tarhi caturṇām āryasatyānām anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya atimātraṁ tīvracchando vyāyāmaś cotsudhiś cāprativāṇiś ca smṛtyā saṁprajanyena ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
K10sf265_sc:wal7: duḥkham āryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyasya iti |
K10sf265_sc:wal8: … o … ai … r … satya sūtraṁ samāptaḥ |
